message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think you'll find it incredibly valuable.  I'm asking for $140 to start. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some more money. I'd be willing to pay $130 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we split the difference and settle at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'd be willing to pay $128 for the product.
